subject: Re: Documentation of junit xml result format
msgSnippet: Thats exactly it. Here is a sample of the xml that my Flash Actionscript code produces. I think it s correct, however I haven t been able to find a reference
messageBody:
Thats exactly it. Here is a sample of the xml that my Flash
Actionscript code produces. I think it's correct, however I haven't
been able to find a reference DTD or specification to be sure.

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<testsuites>
<testsuite name="Flash Profile Card AsUnit Test Suite" errors="1"
failures="1" tests="8" time="8.002">
<testcase classname="djam.lib.test.cases.FailureTest"
name="testError">
<failure type="Error">Reference runtime test error</failure>
</testcase>
<testcase classname="djam.lib.test.cases.FailureTest"
name="testAssertion">
<failure type="AssertionFailedError">Reference assertion test
failure</failure>
</testcase>
</testsuite>
</testsuites>



--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "David Saff" <saff@...> wrote:
>
> Jon,
>
> Are you talking about the results xml produced by the junit ant
task? Thanks,
>
> David Saff
>
> On 8/20/07, marstonstudio <jon@...> wrote:
> > Hello, I've been scouring the web looking for something official which
> > documents the xml format used for junit results. I'm trying to
> > integrate AsUnit (Flash Actionscript) with cruisecontrol.rb. I am
> > generating an xml file similar to the one documented here:
> > http://meb.home.cern.ch/meb/xPyUnit.htm but I am looking for a
> > reference DTD or official specification for junit xml results. Does
> > this exist?
> >
> > Jon Marston
> > marstonstudio.com
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Yahoo! Groups Links
> >
> >
> >
> >
